author: ReverendHellh0und
title: The reality of Obamacare
text: The reality of Obamacare " Thanks Obama for the fine for not having insurance Because the the plan I had that was 398.00 a month for my family only increased to 1400.00 a month in 2014 So I chose not to pay 1400.00 a month So got a nice little fine Thanks for the affordable care act. Thanks for making it so affordable" Nice right? Matthew 10:34 Think not that I am come to send peace on earth: I came not to send peace, but a sword. Re: The reality of Obamacare Part of me is thinking "this is unbelievable...." The immature 16 year old part of me is thinking "GIT REKT!" MOS 19D = cavalry scout = best damn MOS there is Re: The reality of Obamacare Originally Posted by ReverendHellh0und " Thanks Obama for the fine for not having insurance Because the the plan I had that was 398.00 a month for my family only increased to 1400.00 a month in 2014 So I chose not to pay 1400.00 a month So got a nice little fine Thanks for the affordable care act. Thanks for making it so affordable" Nice right? That's a letter from the IRS to you? I thought you lived in New Jersey?
